name: Atinlay Igpay
oracle_text: Oubleday ikestray
Enwhay ouyay eakspay ay onnay-igpay-atinlay ordway, acrificesay Atinlay Igpay.
flavor_text: Isthay iecepay ofay avorflay exttay oesn'tday eallyray aysay anythingay.

name: AWOL
oracle_text: Exile target attacking creature. Then remove it from the game. Then put it into the absolutely-removed-from-the-freaking-game-forever zone.

name: Bosom Buddy
oracle_text: Whenever you cast a spell, you may gain ½ life for each word in that spell's name.
flavor_text: "Step 1: I believe in a power and toughness greater than myself . . . ."

name: Cardpecker
oracle_text: Flying
Gotcha — If an opponent touches the table with their hand, you may say "Gotcha" When you do, return Cardpecker from your graveyard to your hand.

name: Cheap Ass
oracle_text: Spells you cast cost o½ less to cast.
flavor_text: And you thought Yawgmoth drove a hard bargain.

name: Circle of Protection: Art
illustrator: Jim "Stop the Da Vinci Beatdown" Pavelec
oracle_text: As Circle of Protection: Art enters the battlefield, choose an artist.
{1}{W}: The next time a source of your choice with art by the chosen artist would deal damage to you this turn, prevent that damage.
{1}{W}: Return Circle of Protection: Art to its owner's hand.

name: Collector Protector
oracle_text: {W}, Give an opponent a nonland card you own from outside the game: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to you or Collector Protector this turn.
flavor_text: "Here—have a Mudhole."

name: Drawn Together
oracle_text: As Drawn Together enters the battlefield, choose an artist.
Creatures with art by the chosen artist get +2/+2.
flavor_text:
"My Pete Venters theme deck is nearly complete. Then I shall be unstoppable Bwahahahaaa"
—Pete Venters

name: Emcee
oracle_text: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, you may stand up and say in a deep, booming voice, "Presenting . . . " and that creature's name. If you do, put a +1/+1 counter on that creature.
flavor_text: The ogre appealed the match loss and got it downgraded to a warning.

name: Erase (Not the Urza's Legacy One)
illustrator: Pete "Yes the Urza's Legacy One" Venters
oracle_text: If you control two or more white permanents that share an artist, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost.
Exile target enchantment.
flavor_text: Synonyms for "erase" we haven't used: ablate, abrade, chafe, fray, frazzle, scuff, and scrub.

name: Fascist Art Director
oracle_text: {W}{W}: Fascist Art Director gains protection from the artist of your choice until end of turn.
flavor_text:
Dear Mr. and Mrs. Cranford,
After careful analysis of Jeremy's vocational testing, I feel that he is best suited for a career in either torture or art direction.

name: First Come, First Served
oracle_text: Each attacking or blocking creature with the lowest collector number among attacking or blocking creatures has first strike.
flavor_text: The Yotian soldiers hoped that one day R&D would make an artifact creature whose name starts with Z. And in their dreams, it's a 4/1.

name: Frankie Peanuts
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may ask target player a yes-or-no question. If you do, that player answers the question truthfully and abides by that answer if able until end of turn.
flavor_text: Don't cross him or you'll end up sleeping with the merfolk.

name: Head to Head
oracle_text: You and target opponent play Seven Questions with the top card of that player's library. If you win, prevent all damage that would be dealt this turn by a source of your choice. (To play Seven Questions, that player looks at the card, then you ask up to six yes-or-no questions about the card that they answer truthfully. You guess the card's name—that's question seven—then the player reveals the card.)

name: Ladies' Knight
oracle_text: Flying
Spells cast by players wearing at least one item of women's clothing cost {1} less to cast. (You can define women's clothing as you see fit. Be reasonable.)
flavor_text:
"I said ‘Put him in a core set, not a corset'"
—Richard Garfield, Ph.D.

name: Little Girl
flavor_text: In the future, she may be a distinguished leader, a great scholar, or a decorated hero. These days all she does is pee the bed.

name: Look at Me, I'm R&D
oracle_text: As Look at Me, I'm R&D enters the battlefield, choose a number and a second number one higher or one lower than the first number.
All instances of the first chosen number in the full text of each permanent, spell, and card in any zone are changed to the second chosen number.

name: Man of Measure
oracle_text: As long as you're shorter than an opponent, Man of Measure gets +0/+1 and has first strike.
As long as you're taller than an opponent, Man of Measure gets +1/+0.
flavor_text: You need to be this tall to play this card.

name: Save Life
oracle_text: Choose one —
• Target player gains 2½ life.
• Prevent the next 2½ damage that would be dealt to target creature this turn.
Gotcha — If an opponent says "save" or "life," you may say "Gotcha" When you do, return Save Life from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Who consistently managed to win.

name: Standing Army
oracle_text: As long as you're standing, Standing Army has vigilance.
flavor_text: They're the chair-men of the bored.

name: Staying Power
oracle_text: "Until end of turn" and "this turn" effects don't end.
flavor_text: Mongo's fleas no longer bothered him. But the family of goblins that had moved in behind his left ear was starting to get really irritating.

name: Wordmail
oracle_text: Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 for each word in its name.
flavor_text:
"Suck on it, Stangg"
—Sol'kanar the Swamp King

oracle_text: {1}: This card's name becomes the card name of your choice. Activate this ability anywhere, anytime.
flavor_text: {1}: This card's flavor text becomes the flavor text of your choice. (This ability doesn't work because it's flavor text, not rules text (but neither does this reminder text, so you figure it out).)

name: Ambiguity
oracle_text: Whenever a player plays a spell that counters a spell that has been played or a player plays a spell that comes into play with counters, that player may counter the next spell played or put an additional counter on a permanent that has already been played, but not countered.

name: Artful Looter
oracle_text: {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.
Whenever a permanent that shares an artist with another permanent you control enters the battlefield, untap Artful Looter.
flavor_text:
PRICELESS PIC PILFERED
Painting Found Abandoned in Graveyard
Merfolk Decry Wizards' Treatment

name: Avatar of Me
oracle_text: This spell costs {1} more to cast for each ten years you've been alive.
Avatar of Me's power is equal to your height in feet and its toughness is equal to your American shoe size. Round to the nearest ½.
Avatar of Me is the color of your eyes.

name: Brushstroke Paintermage
illustrator: Ron "Don't You Dare Change Me" Spears
oracle_text: {T}: Target permanent's artist becomes the artist of your choice until end of turn.
flavor_text: He gives credit where credit isn't due.

name: Bursting Beebles
oracle_text: Bursting Beebles can't be blocked as long as defending player controls two or more nonland permanents that share an artist.
flavor_text: Like thousands of others, the beebles quit Magic for several years following the release of the Mercadian Masques set.

name: Carnivorous Death-Parrot
oracle_text: Flying
At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Carnivorous Death-Parrot unless you say its flavor text.
flavor_text: Save a kill spell to deal with this guy.

name: Cheatyface
oracle_text: If Cheatyface is in your hand, you may sneak Cheatyface onto the battlefield. If an opponent catches you right away, that player may exile Cheatyface.
Flying

name: Double Header
oracle_text: Flying
When Double Header enters the battlefield, you may return target permanent with a two-word name to its owner's hand.
flavor_text: Players that don't read flavor text aren't too bright, sorta smell, and dress funny. But let's just keep this between us, okay? They can get kind of violent.

name: Flaccify
oracle_text: Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}o½.
flavor_text: "Don't worry about it. It happens to every mage sooner or later."

name: Framed!
illustrator: Alan "Don't Feel Like You Have to Pick Me" Pollack
oracle_text: Choose an artist. Tap all untapped permanents with art by that artist or untap all tapped permanents with art by that artist.
flavor_text: Who knew an 8˝ by 10˝ could feel like a 2˝ by 4˝?

name: Greater Morphling
oracle_text: {2}: Greater Morphling gains your choice of banding, bushido 1, double strike, fear, flying, first strike, haste, landwalk of your choice, protection from a color of your choice, provoke, rampage 1, shadow, or trample until end of turn.
{2}: Greater Morphling becomes the colors of your choice until end of turn.
{2}: Greater Morphling becomes the creature type of your choice until end of turn.
{2}: Greater Morphling's expansion symbol becomes the symbol of your choice until end of turn.
{2}: Greater Morphling's art becomes by the artist of your choice until end of turn.
{2}: Greater Morphling gets +2/-2 or -2/+2 until end of turn.
{2}: Untap Greater Morphling.

name: Johnny, Combo Player
oracle_text: {4}: Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: "Just wait till I get my Krark-Clan Ironworks, Genesis Chamber, and Grinding Station. Oh yeah, and a second Myr Retriever."

name: Loose Lips
oracle_text: Enchant creature
As Loose Lips enters the battlefield, choose a sentence with eight or fewer words.
Enchanted creature has flying.
Whenever enchanted creature deals damage to an opponent, that player may say the chosen sentence. If they don't, you draw two cards.
flavor_text: Your sentence can't be longer than this one.

name: Magical Hacker
oracle_text: {U}: Change the text of target spell or permanent by replacing all instances of + with -, and vice versa, until end of turn.

name: Mise
oracle_text: Choose a nonland card name, then reveal the top card of your library. If that card has the chosen name, you draw three cards.
flavor_text: mise 'miz v alter. of might as well (1997) 1: to win when you don't deserve to 2: to top-deck the "tings" you need 3: to be rewarded by an opponent's bad luck 4: to coin a phrase that spreads through the tournament scene like wildfire 5: to fling a monkey 6: to split firewood using a sharp instrument 7: To burn

name: Moniker Mage
oracle_text: {U}, Say your middle name: Moniker Mage gains shroud until end of turn.
{U}, Say an opponent's middle name: Moniker Mage gains flying until end of turn.

name: Mouth to Mouth
oracle_text: Choose target opponent and target creature they control. You and that player have a breath-holding contest. If you win, you gain control of that creature.
flavor_text: Interesting tidbit: Surveys show that the card Ow has one of the most popular pieces of flavor text in the Unglued expansion.

name: Now I Know My ABC's
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control permanents with names that include all twenty-six letters of the English alphabet, you win the game.
flavor_text: The quick onyx goblin jumps over the lazy dwarf.

name: Number Crunch
oracle_text: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.
Gotcha — If an opponent says a number, you may say "Gotcha" When you do, return Number Crunch from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Can you digit?

name: Question Elemental?
oracle_text: Did you know this creature has flying?
Are you aware that any time you say something that isn't a question, when a player points out this fact first, they gain control of Question Elemental?
flavor_text: "What the . . . ?"

name: Richard Garfield, Ph.D.
oracle_text: You may play cards as though they were other cards of your choice with the same mana cost. You can't choose the same card twice. (Mana cost includes color.)
flavor_text: And yea he doth spake: "Let there be Magic."

name: Smart Ass
oracle_text: Whenever Smart Ass attacks, choose a card name. If defending player has no cards with the chosen name in their hand, they may reveal their hand. If they don't reveal their hand, Smart Ass can't be blocked this turn.
flavor_text: "I don't get it. Why doesn't anybody like me?"

name: Spell Counter
oracle_text: Counter target spell.
Gotcha — If an opponent says "spell" or "counter," you may say "Gotcha" When you do, return Spell Counter from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Playing Unhinged, . . .

name: Topsy Turvy
oracle_text: The phases of each player's turn are reversed. (The phases are, in reverse order, ending, postcombat main, combat, precombat main, and beginning.)
As long as there are more than two players in the game, the turn order is reversed.
flavor_text: "Here on going is heck the what?"

name: Aesthetic Consultation
oracle_text: Choose an artist. Exile the top six cards of your library, then reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a card with art by the chosen artist. Put that card in your hand and exile all other cards revealed this way.

name: Bad Ass
oracle_text: {1}{B}, Growl: Regenerate Bad Ass.
flavor_text: He wanders the land in search of Good Ass.

name: Bloodletter
oracle_text: When the names of three or more nonland permanents begin with the same letter, sacrifice Bloodletter. If you do, it deals 2 damage to each creature and each player.
flavor_text:
"That's not really an A. It's an Æ. They changed it! Wait, don't—"
—Hœbrus Væm, Aerathi librarian, last words

name: Booster Tutor
oracle_text: Open a sealed Magic booster pack, reveal the cards, and put one of those cards into your hand. (Remove that card from your deck before beginning a new game.)
flavor_text: Real men use Arabian Nights boosters.

name: Duh
oracle_text: Destroy target creature with reminder text. (Reminder text is any italicized text in parentheses that explains rules you already know.)
flavor_text:
Will players understand that the creature is being crushed by two parentheses?
Not a chance.

name: Enter the Dungeon
oracle_text: Players play a Magic subgame under the table, starting at 5 life and using their libraries as their decks. The winner searches their library for two cards, puts those cards into their hand, then shuffles their library.

name: Eye to Eye
oracle_text: You and target creature's controller have a staring contest. If you win, destroy that creature.
flavor_text: True, Gargox had blinded himself for life, but the glass eyes never lost.

name: The Fallen Apart
oracle_text: The Fallen Apart enters the battlefield with two arms and two legs.
Whenever damage is dealt to The Fallen Apart, remove an arm or a leg from it.
The Fallen Apart can't attack if it has no legs and can't block if it has no arms.

name: Farewell to Arms
oracle_text: As Farewell to Arms enters the battlefield, choose a hand attached to an opponent's arm.
When the chosen hand isn't behind its owner's back, sacrifice Farewell to Arms. If you do, that player discards their hand . . . of cards. (The lawyers wouldn't let us do it the other way.)

name: Infernal Spawn of Infernal Spawn of Evil
oracle_text: Flying, first strike, trample

Once each turn, while you're searching your library, you may pay {1}{B}, reveal Infernal Spawn of Infernal Spawn of Evil from your library and say "I'm coming, too" If you do, Infernal Spawn of Infernal Spawn of Evil deals 2 damage to a player of your choice.

name: Kill! Destroy!
oracle_text: Destroy target nonblack creature.
Gotcha — If an opponent says "kill" or "destroy," you may say "Gotcha" When you do, return Kill Destroy from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Getting "Gotcha'ed" again and again.

name: Mother of Goons
oracle_text: Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, sacrifice Mother of Goons unless you insult that creature.
flavor_text: "Word to me."

name: Necro-Impotence
oracle_text: Skip your untap step.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may pay X life. If you do, untap X permanents.
Pay ½ life: Exile the top card of your library face down. Put that card into your hand at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Persecute Artist
oracle_text: Choose an artist other than Rebecca Guay. Target player reveals their hand and discards all nonland cards with art by the chosen artist.
flavor_text: The torches and pitchforks were no match for Rebecca's fans.

name: Phyrexian Librarian
oracle_text: Flying, trample
At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top card of your library and balance it on your body.
When a balanced card falls or touches another balanced card, sacrifice Phyrexian Librarian.

name: Stop That
oracle_text: Target player discards a card.
Gotcha — If an opponent audibly flicks the cards in their hand, you may say "Gotcha" When you do, return Stop That from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Now for a squirt of lemon juice.

name: Tainted Monkey
oracle_text: {T}: Choose a word. Target player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard. If that card has the chosen word in its text box, that player loses 3 life.
flavor_text: "C'mon, choose ‘monkey.' Everybody loves monkeys"

name: Vile Bile
oracle_text: Whenever a player's skin or fingernail touches Vile Bile, that player loses 2 life.

name: Wet Willie of the Damned
oracle_text: Wet Willie of the Damned deals 2½ damage to any target and you gain 2½ life.
flavor_text: Ever the warrior, Glissa responded with a "wedgie from beyond Uranus."

name: When Fluffy Bunnies Attack
oracle_text: Target creature gets -X/-X until end of turn, where X is the number of times the letter of your choice appears in that creature's name.
flavor_text:
"Get it? Bunnies, letters, -X/-X? Me neither."
—Bucky, flavor text writer

name: Working Stiff
oracle_text: As Working Stiff enters the battlefield, straighten your arms.
When you bend an elbow, sacrifice Working Stiff.
flavor_text: Oh, does your nose itch?

name: Zombie Fanboy
oracle_text: As Zombie Fanboy enters the battlefield, choose an artist.
Whenever a permanent with art by the chosen artist is put into a graveyard, put two +1/+1 counters on Zombie Fanboy.
flavor_text: The real advantage of being a zombie gamer? No one notices the stench.

name: Zzzyxas's Abyss
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, destroy all nonland permanents with the first name alphabetically among nonland permanents.
flavor_text: Tired of always being picked last, the wizard Zzzyxas created the ultimate revenge.

name: Assquatch
oracle_text: Each other Donkey gets +1½/+1½.
Whenever another Donkey enters the battlefield, untap target creature and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn.
flavor_text: Who wants to see a picture of a big hairy ass?

name: Blast from the Past
oracle_text: Madness {R}, cycling {1}{R}, kicker {2}{R}, flashback {3}{R}, buyback {4}{R}
Blast from the Past deals 2 damage to any target. If this spell was kicked, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token.

name: Curse of the Fire Penguin
oracle_text: Trample
When this creature dies, return Curse of the Fire Penguin to the battlefield.

name: Deal Damage
oracle_text: Deal Damage deals 4 damage to any target.
Gotcha — If an opponent says "deal" or "damage," you may say "Gotcha" When you do, return Deal Damage from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Until he got singed . . .

name: Dumb Ass
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, flip a coin. If you lose the flip, target opponent chooses whether Dumb Ass attacks this turn.
flavor_text: Envying the intelligence of goblins is a bad place to be.

name: Face to Face
oracle_text: You and target opponent play a best two-out-of-three Rock, Paper, Scissors match. If you win, Face to Face deals 5 damage to that player.
flavor_text: Befuddled by this new game, Argg longed for the days of Rock, Rock, Rock.

name: Frazzled Editor
oracle_text: Protection from wordy (Something is wordy if it has four or more lines of rules text.)
flavor_text: The pen is mightier than the sword.

name: Goblin Mime
oracle_text: When you speak, sacrifice Goblin Mime.
flavor_text: Pretending to be inside an invisible box was easy enough for Brug. It was finding the invisible door that caused him problems.

name: Goblin Secret Agent
oracle_text: First strike
At the beginning of your upkeep, reveal a card from your hand at random.
flavor_text:
SECRET AGENT
PD042198
LICENSE TO BE KILLED

name: Goblin S.W.A.T. Team
oracle_text: Say "Goblin S.W.A.T. Team": Put a +1/+1 counter on Goblin S.W.A.T. Team unless an opponent swats the table within five seconds. Activate this ability only once each turn.
flavor_text: They put the "special" in special weapons and tactics.

name: Mana Flair
oracle_text: Add {R} for each nonland permanent with art by the artist of your choice.
flavor_text:
What began as black
Has slowly shifted to red.
Fickle color pie.

name: Mons's Goblin Waiters
oracle_text: Sacrifice a creature or land: Add {Half a Red}.
flavor_text:
Poached Rukh Eggs
Rock
Cooked Rock
Unicorn-on-the-Cob
Wormfang Turtle Soup

name: Orcish Paratroopers
oracle_text: When Orcish Paratroopers enters the battlefield, flip it from a height of at least one foot. Sacrifice Orcish Paratroopers unless it turns over completely at least once during the flip and lands face up.
flavor_text:
IOU one parashoot
—Urk, mogg fanatic

name: Punctuate
oracle_text: Punctuate deals damage to target creature equal to half the number of punctuation marks in that creature's text box. (The punctuation marks are  ? , ; : - — ( ) / " " ‘ ' & .)
flavor_text: "Ooh—right in the colon."

name: Pygmy Giant
oracle_text: {R}, {T}, Sacrifice a creature: Pygmy Giant deals X damage to target creature, where X is a number in the sacrificed creature's text box.
flavor_text:
"487. You're welcome."
—Bucky, flavor text writer

name: Red-Hot Hottie
oracle_text: Whenever Red-Hot Hottie deals damage to a creature, put a third-degree-burn counter on that creature. It gains "At the beginning of each end step, sacrifice this creature unless you scream ‘Aaah' at the top of your lungs."
flavor_text: She was winning the Dominarian "Are You Hot?" competition until disaster struck during the wet T-shirt round.

name: Rocket-Powered Turbo Slug
oracle_text: Super haste (This may attack the turn before you cast it. (You may put this card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking during your declare attackers step. If you do, you lose the game at the beginning of your next turn's end step unless you pay this card's mana cost during that turn.))

name: Sauté
oracle_text: Sauté deals 3½ damage to any target.
flavor_text:
"Selecting the proper beeble is the key to a good sauté. The pinker the fur and the heartier the yelp, the more succulent the beeble will be when you pop it in your mouth."
—Asmoranomardicadaistinaculdacar,
The Underworld Cookbook,

name: Six-y Beast
oracle_text: As Six-y Beast enters the battlefield, you secretly put six or fewer +1/+1 counters on it, then an opponent guesses the number of counters. If that player guesses right, sacrifice Six-y Beast after it enters the battlefield.
flavor_text: Is it six?

name: Touch and Go
oracle_text: Destroy target land.
Gotcha — If an opponent touches their face, you may say "Gotcha" When you do, return Touch and Go from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Judge's ruling: The interior of the face still counts as the face, so a nose-pick is legitimate grounds for saying "Gotcha"

name: Yet Another Aether Vortex
oracle_text: All creatures have haste.
Players play with the top card of their libraries revealed.
Noninstant, nonsorcery cards on top of a library are on the battlefield under their owner's control in addition to being in that library.
flavor_text: It puts the "vortex" in "flavortext."

name: B-I-N-G-O
oracle_text: Trample
Whenever a player casts a spell, put a chip counter on its converted mana cost.
B-I-N-G-O gets +9/+9 for each set of three numbers in a row with chip counters on them.
flavor_text: There was a farmer, had a hound . . .

name: Creature Guy
oracle_text: Gotcha — If an opponent says "creature" or "guy," you may say "Gotcha" When you do, return Creature Guy from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: There once was a player named Quinn, . . .

name: Elvish House Party
oracle_text: Elvish House Party's power and toughness are each equal to the current hour, using the twelve-hour system.
flavor_text: The party was going strong for nearly an hour past midnight—then all of a sudden it just petered out.

name: Fat Ass
oracle_text: Fat Ass gets +2/+2 and has trample as long as you're eating. (Gum isn't food. We checked.)
flavor_text: Our lawyers say no matter how funny it would be, we can't encourage players to eat the cards. Hear that? Whatever you do, don't eat the delicious cards.

name: Form of the Squirrel
oracle_text: As Form of the Squirrel enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 green Squirrel creature token. You lose the game when that creature leaves the battlefield.
Creatures can't attack you.
You have shroud.
You can't cast spells.

name: Fraction Jackson
oracle_text: {G}, {T}: Return target card with a ½ on it from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: Bitten by radioactive beebles in a freak algebra accident, young Ricky Robertson discovered he'd gained the ability to harness the awesome power of fractions

name: Gluetius Maximus
oracle_text: As Gluetius Maximus enters the battlefield, an opponent chooses one of your fingers. (Thumbs are fingers, too.)
When the chosen finger isn't touching Gluetius Maximus, sacrifice Gluetius Maximus.

name: Granny's Payback
oracle_text: You gain life equal to your age.
flavor_text:
R&D Comments
BB 10/10: Why does a life-gaining card show an old lady killing people?
MR (10/10/03): We'll fix it in the flavor text.

name: Graphic Violence
oracle_text: All creatures with art by the artist of your choice get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.
flavor_text: WARNING: THE DOMINARIAN SURGEON GENERAL HAS FOUND THAT SAVAGE BEATINGS CAN LEAD TO CHUMP BLOCKS, LIFE REDUCTION, AND EVEN GAME LOSS.

name: Keeper of the Sacred Word
oracle_text: As Keeper of the Sacred Word enters the battlefield, choose a word.
Whenever an opponent says the chosen word, Keeper of the Sacred Word gets +3/+3 until end of turn.
flavor_text: This is not a subliminal message.

name: Land Aid '04
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library. If you sang a song the whole time you were searching and shuffling, you may untap that land.

name: Laughing Hyena
oracle_text: Gotcha — If an opponent laughs, you may say "Gotcha" When you do, return Laughing Hyena from your graveyard to your hand.
flavor_text: "Two muffins are baking in an oven. One muffin says to the other muffin, ‘It's getting hot in here, huh?' The other muffin says, ‘Aagh A talking muffin'"

name: Monkey Monkey Monkey
oracle_text: As Monkey Monkey Monkey enters the battlefield, choose a letter.
Monkey Monkey Monkey gets +1/+1 for each nonland permanent whose name begins with the chosen letter.
flavor_text: Many matches make more madcap monkey mayhem.

name: Name Dropping
oracle_text: Gotcha — If an opponent says a word that's in the name of a card in your graveyard, you may say "Gotcha" When you do, return that card to your hand.
flavor_text: Gemini (May 21–June 21) This week is a good time to branch out and meet others, but don't forget your roots. Avoid commitments and open flame.

name: Old Fogey
oracle_text: Phasing, cumulative upkeep {1}, echo {G}{G}, fading 3, bands with other Dinosaurs, protection from Homarids, snow-covered plainswalk, flanking, rampage 2
flavor_text: "These kids today with their collector numbers and their newfangled tap symbol. Twenty Black Lotuses and twenty Plague Rats. Now that's real Magic."

name: Our Market Research Shows That Players Like Really Long Card Names So We Made this Card to Have the Absolute Longest Card Name Ever Elemental
oracle_text: Art rampage 2 (Whenever this creature becomes blocked by a creature, it gets +2/+2 for each creature in the blocker's art beyond the first.)
flavor_text: Just call it OMRSTPLRLCNSWMTCTHTALCNEE for short.

name: Remodel
oracle_text: If you control two or more green permanents that share an artist, you may cast this spell without paying its mana cost.
Exile target artifact.
flavor_text:
6 PM (23) This Old Grove 98055
A rusted masticore makes a beautiful addition to any garden.

name: Shoe Tree
oracle_text: Shoe Tree enters the battlefield with up to two shoe counters on it. Use your shoes as counters.
Shoe Tree gets +1/+1 for each shoe counter on it.
flavor_text: It grows several feet a year.

name: Side to Side
oracle_text: You and target opponent arm-wrestle. If you win, create a 3/3 green Ape creature token.
flavor_text: His friends at the gym never knew Garanth's secret shame. For years he had tried to walk away from professional arm wrestling, but hey—free monkeys.

name: S.N.O.T.
oracle_text: You may have S.N.O.T. enter the battlefield stuck to another creature named S.N.O.T. If you do, all those creatures form a single creature.

S.N.O.T.'s power and toughness are each equal to the square of the number of cards named S.N.O.T. stuck together to form it. (One is a 1/1, two are a 4/4, three are a 9/9, and four are a 16/16. If you manage to get -1 S.N.O.T.s stuck together, it's a 1/1.)

name: Stone-Cold Basilisk
oracle_text: Whenever Stone-Cold Basilisk blocks or becomes blocked by a creature with fewer letters in its name, destroy that creature at end of combat. (Punctuation and spaces aren't letters.)
Whenever an opponent reads Stone-Cold Basilisk, that player is turned to stone until end of turn. Stoned players can't attack, block, cast spells, or activate abilities.

name: Supersize
oracle_text: Target creature gets +3½/+3½ until end of turn.
flavor_text: You want "mise" with that?

name: Symbol Status
oracle_text: Create a 1/1 colorless Expansion-Symbol creature token for each different expansion symbol among permanents you control.
flavor_text:
"Everyone break into teams. Weaponry, you're with me. Nature group, meet by the palm tree. Stoneworks and metalworks, follow the anvil. Everyone else, gather around the giant V."
—Sword of Kaldra

name: Uktabi Kong
oracle_text: Trample
When Uktabi Kong enters the battlefield, destroy all artifacts.
Tap two untapped Apes you control: Create a 1/1 green Ape creature token.
flavor_text: "I desire the acquisition of a potassium-rich fruit comestible of substantial magnitude."

name: "Ach! Hans, Run!"
oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may say "Ach Hans, run It's the . . ." and the name of a creature card. If you do, search your library for a card with that name, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. That creature gains haste. Exile it at the beginning of the next end step.

name: Ass Whuppin'
oracle_text: Destroy target silver-bordered permanent in any game you can see from your seat.
flavor_text:
Asses to ashes,
Donkeys to dust.

name: Meddling Kids
oracle_text: As Meddling Kids enters the battlefield, choose a word with four or more letters.
Spells with the chosen word in their text box can't be cast.
flavor_text: These kids know their four-letter words.

name: Rare-B-Gone
oracle_text: Each player sacrifices all permanents that are rare or mythic rare, then each player reveals their hand and discards all cards that are rare or mythic rare.
flavor_text: The only rare you'll ever need. Okay, not really.

name: Gleemax
oracle_text: You choose all targets for all spells and abilities.
flavor_text: Help us . . . R&D under mental domination of alien brain in jar . . . only chance . . . Gleemax's blatant disregard for flavor text . . . send help

name: Letter Bomb
oracle_text: When Letter Bomb enters the battlefield, sign it and shuffle it into target player's library. That player reveals each card they draw until they draw Letter Bomb. When that player draws Letter Bomb, it deals 19½ damage to them.
flavor_text: "Dear Magic R&D, . . ."

name: Mana Screw
oracle_text: {1}: Flip a coin. If you win the flip, add {C}{C}. Activate this ability only any time you could cast an instant.
flavor_text: There was no darker or more evil creation in all the multiverse than that of the mana screw.

name: Mox Lotus
oracle_text: {T}: Add {Infinite}.
{10}0: Add one mana of any color.

name: My First Tome
oracle_text: {1}, {T}: Say the flavor text on a card in your hand. Target opponent guesses that card's name. You may reveal that card. If you do and they guessed wrong, you draw a card.
flavor_text: This card is named My First Tome.

name: Pointy Finger of Doom
oracle_text: {3}, {T}: Spin Pointy Finger of Doom in the middle of the table so that it rotates completely at least once, then destroy the closest permanent the finger points to.
flavor_text:
"I would have made a ‘Spin-The-Bottle' joke if I thought anyone reading this had ever played the game."
—Bucky, flavor text writer

name: Rod of Spanking
oracle_text: {2}, {T}: Rod of Spanking deals 1 damage to target player. Then untap Rod of Spanking unless that player says "Thank you, sir. May I have another?"
flavor_text: Minutes before the campus watch busted pledge week at the Alpha Beta Unlimited house . . .

name: Time Machine
oracle_text: {T}: Exile Time Machine and target nontoken creature you own. Return them to the battlefield at the beginning of your upkeep on your turn X in the next game you play with one of your opponents in this game, where X is the converted mana cost of the exiled creature.

name: Togglodyte
oracle_text: Togglodyte enters the battlefield turned on.
Whenever a player casts a spell, toggle Togglodyte's ON/OFF switch.
As long as Togglodyte is turned off, it can't attack or block, and prevent all damage it would deal.

name: Toy Boat
oracle_text: Cumulative upkeep—Say "Toy Boat" quickly. (At the beginning of your upkeep, put an age counter on Toy Boat, then sacrifice it unless you say "Toy Boat" once for each age counter on it—without pausing between or fumbling it.)

name: Urza's Hot Tub
oracle_text: {2}, Discard a card: Search your library for a card that shares a complete word in its name with the discarded card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.
flavor_text: www.wizards.com/hottub

name: Water Gun Balloon Game
oracle_text: As Water Gun Balloon Game enters the battlefield, each player puts a pop counter on a 0.
Whenever a player casts a spell, move that player's pop counter up 1.
Whenever a player's pop counter hits 5, that player creates a 5/5 pink Giant Teddy Bear creature token and resets all pop counters to 0.

name: World-Bottling Kit
oracle_text: {5}, Sacrifice World-Bottling Kit: Choose a Magic set. Exile all permanents with that set's expansion symbol except for basic lands.
flavor_text: YOUR AD HERE

name: City of Ass
oracle_text: City of Ass enters the battlefield tapped.
{T}: Add one and one-half mana of any one color.

name: R&D's Secret Lair
oracle_text: Play cards as written. Ignore all errata.
{T}: Add {C}. (This mana is still added to your mana pool.)
flavor_text:
"Let them complain. As long as the addictive ink is working, we can do anything we want."
PLAY AT YOUR OWN RISK

name: Super Secret Tech
oracle_text: Premium spells cost {1} less to cast.
Premium creatures get +1/+1.
flavor_text: "Ooh . . . shiny"
